--- title: "Garage sale" description: | Sale of some things that I will not be able to take with me in my move date: 2025-05-22 about: template: marquee image-shape: rectangle draft: false engine: knitr --- ## 1 Gamer PC (2500 €) * CPU: [AMD Ryzen 9 7900](https://www.amd.com/en/products/processors/desktops/ryzen/7000-series/amd-ryzen-9-7900.html) * GPU: [GIGABYTE GeForce RTX 4070 WINDFORCE OC 12GB DDRX6 21 Gbps](https://www.gigabyte.com/Graphics-Card/GV-N4070WF3OC-12GD-rev-10) * RAM: [Corsair VENGEANCE 64GB (2x32GB) DDR5 DRAM 6000MT/s CL30 AMD EXPO](https://www.corsair.com/fr/fr/p/memory/cmk64gx5m2b6000z30/vengeance-64gb-2x32gb-ddr5-dram-6000mt-s-cl30-amd-expo-memory-kit-cmk64gx5m2b6000z30) * SSD: [Samsung 990 Pro 1 TB NVMe M.2](https://www.samsung.com/us/computing/memory-storage/solid-state-drives/990-pro-pcie--4-0-nvme--ssd-1tb-mz-v9p1t0b-am/) * Motherboard: [ASUS ROG Strix B650E-E](https://rog.asus.com/motherboards/rog-strix/rog-strix-b650e-e-gaming-wifi-model/) * Frontal fans: 2 x [Be Quiet! Silent Wings 4 140 mm](https://www.bequiet.com/en/casefans/3704) * Back fan: 1 x [Be Quiet! Silent Wings 4 120 mm](https://www.bequiet.com/en/casefans/3700) * Watercooling: [Arctic Liquid Freezer III 240](https://www.arctic.de/en/Liquid-Freezer-III-240/ACFRE00134A) * Power supply: [ASUS Prime 750 W Gold](https://www.asus.com/motherboards-components/power-supply-units/prime/ap-750g/) * Case: [Fractal Design Meshify 2 Compact](https://www.fractal-design.com/products/cases/meshify/meshify-2-compact/black-tg-dark-tint/) The price (2500 €) is for the entire CPU, **I am NOT selling parts separately**. If you live/work in a city around Sète (e.g. Montpellier), I can bring the PC and leave it installed in your home/office. ![](images/pc-01.png) ![](images/pc-02.png) ![](images/pc-03.png) ![](images/pc-04.png) ```{=html}
``` ## ~~2 QHD monitors (Price: 250 € both)~~ (SOLD) * Brand-Model: Dell-S2722DC * Type: LED-backlit LCD monitor / TFT active matrix * Diagonal Size: 27" * Native Resolution: QHD 2560 x 1440 at 75 Hz * Response Time: 4 ms * Interfaces: 2xHDMI, USB-C upstream/DisplayPort with Power Delivery, USB 3.2 Gen 1 downstream with Battery Charging 1.2, USB 3.2 Gen 1 downstream, Audio line-out * Audio: speakers - stereo * Rotation: -90°/+90° * Allows adjustment in height and front tilt. * Website: The price (€250) is for both monitors TOGETHER, **I am NOT selling them separately**. * Both displays ![](images/displays.jpeg) * Monitor 1 ![](images/display1-01.jpeg) ![](images/display1-02.jpeg) ![](images/display1-03.jpeg) * Monitor 2 ![](images/display2-01.jpeg) ![](images/display2-02.jpeg) ![](images/display2-03.jpeg) ## Soundbar Sony (50 €) * Brand-Model: Sony HT-SF200 * Power output: 80 W * Audio Formats: HDMI (Dolby® Digital,Dolby® Dual mono,LPCM 2ch), USB (WAV,MP3,WMA), Optical input (Dolby® Digital,Dolby® Dual mono,LPCM 2ch), Bluetooth (SBC). * Interfaces: HDMI Arc, Optical-audio, USB type-A, Bluetooth 4.2 * Size: 58 x 6.4 x 9.5 cm * Weight: 2.3 kg * Includes remote control and original power supply. * Website: ![](images/soundbar-01.jpeg) ![](images/soundbar-02.jpeg) ![](images/soundbar-03.jpeg) ![](images/soundbar-04.jpeg) ![](images/soundbar-05.jpeg) ## Charger UGreen 65 W (15 €) * Power: 65 W max * Input: 100-240 V ~50/60 Hz 1.8 A max * Output: 2 x USB-C, 1 x USB-A * GaN 2 Tech * Website: ![](images/chr-01.jpeg) ![](images/chr-02.jpeg) ![](images/chr-03.jpeg) ## ~~Powerbank Sony 10000 mAh (10 €)~~ **SOLD** * Brand-Model: Sony CP-V10B * Battery capacity: 3.8 V 10 000 mAh * Output interfaces: 1xUSB-A, 1xUSB-C * Website: ![](images/pb-01.png) ![](images/pb-02.png) ![](images/pb-03.png) ![](images/pb-04.png) ## Silent Fan (15 €) * 4 speeds * Automatic rotation in 180° * LED light * USB-C charging * Website: ![](images/fan-01.jpeg) ![](images/fan-02.jpeg) ![](images/fan-03.jpeg) ## Herb blender (10 €) * 1 speed * Fully functional * ~1 year of very occasional use * Includes container and blades ![](images/mixer-01.jpeg) ![](images/mixer-02.jpeg) ![](images/mixer-03.jpeg) ![](images/mixer-04.jpeg)
